data.name: Outbreak: Shades of Horror Demo
data.detailed_description:
Experience next generation survival horror in the Outbreak: Shades of Horror Playable Teaser! You awaken in the opening hours of a viral undead outbreak after a dangerous accident, and must find a way to escape. Explore your surroundings carefully, scrounge for supplies, and be weary of the encroaching infection as you fight for survival. Your decisions will determine your fate... Can you uncover all of the shades of horror?

This playable teaser is intended to convey the graphics fidelity and tone for Outbreak: Shades of Horror, and only includes a small subset of the overall experience. It is not representative of the features and gameplay in the final release.

data.short_description: Experience the dawn of next generation survival horror in the Outbreak: Shades of Horror Playable Teaser!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Portuguese, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (7/8/10) 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX 2080
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Plays best with an Xbox One gamepad

content_descriptors.notes: The Outbreak: Shades of Horror Playable Teaser includes gore, blood, corpses, psychological horror, and other mature themes depicting an in-progress viral undead outbreak on a major city.
